tool_description: Validates extracted candidate data for completeness, consistency, and format correctness across all profile fields.

experience_data.description: JSON string containing work experience information

validation_rules.description: Specific validation rules to apply: email_format, phone_format, date_consistency, required_fields

strict_mode.description: Enable strict validation with higher requirements

error_messages: Invalid JSON format: One or more data parameters contain invalid JSON strings.
Missing required data: All four data parameters (contact, education, experience, skills) must be provided.
Invalid validation rules: Use valid rules from [email_format, phone_format, date_consistency, required_fields].
Empty data fields: Provided data contains no extractable information for validation.
usage: Provide JSON strings for all four data types extracted from the resume. Configure validation_rules to specify which checks to perform and enable strict_mode for more rigorous validation.

is_valid.description: Whether the profile data passes all validation checks

validation_warnings.description: List of validation warnings for potential issues

missing_fields.description: Required fields that are missing or incomplete
